title: 1 BED Available June Move In Special 300.00 off!!
posting_body: Below to Send Us an Email through our Website:
Rockside Place Apartments in Garfield Heights offers affordable apartment living with great community amenities.

All throughout Rockside Place Apartments, residents will find fantastic services that include twenty-four-hour maintenance, on-site management, convenient laundry on-site, ample parking, and additional storage spaces.
Rockside Place Apartments also has a great selection of one-, two and three-bedroom apartment homes for rent.
These homes come with individual climate controls, mini blinds, washer and dryers in every building, linen closets, and air conditioning.
Rockside Place Apartments is in a quiet neighborhood and is within proximity to popular Garfield shopping plaza and dining establishments.
If you are ready to live in this beautiful community, stop by Rockside Place Apartments Today!!!!!!!
•	Sunday: open the first Sunday of every month
